definitions.definition: A person who lives near a given place.
examples: It's easy to tell the locals from the tourists.

definitions.definition: A branch of a nationwide organization such as a trade union .
examples: I'm in the TWU, too. Local 6.
The expresses skipped my station, so I had to take a local .

definitions.definition: One's nearest or regularly frequented public house or bar .
examples: I got barred from my local , so I've started going all the way into town for a drink.
Functional programming languages usually don't allow changing the immediate value of locals once they've been initialized, unless they're explicitly marked as being mutable.

definitions.definition: An item of news relating to the place where the newspaper is published.
An independent trader who acts for themselves rather than on behalf of investors .
A Twitter user who is not a part of Stan Twitter .

main_definition: A person who lives near a given place.
secondary_definitions: A branch of a nationwide organization such as a trade union .
( rail transport ) Clipping of local train .
( British ) One's nearest or regularly frequented public house or bar .
( US , slang , journalism ) An item of news relating to the place where the newspaper is published.
( colloquial , medicine ) Clipping of local anesthetic .
( finance ) An independent trader who acts for themselves rather than on behalf of investors .
( fandom slang , derogatory ) A Twitter user who is not a part of Stan Twitter .
